page.title: 06Farm Interview. Part 1.
page.content: {Goffin's farm}is situated on a hill north of Exeter.It is a mixed Dairy Farm covering 284 acres and 25 fields.The houses and the land are owned by Messrs J+L. Trott. 134 acres are rented. The dairy farm has managed grassland,some turnips,wheat, and barley.Linda is their only employee. They estimate the land has been farmed since the original Domesday survey.The house is about 300 years old.There are 3 barns, a milking parlour and cattleshed. The spread of the city and increased traffic has effected their farm.They have 70 Friesian cows producing 1000 litres of milk a day,11 in-calf heifers,30 beef cattle and 10 young heifers,one mower, a truck, ploughs, harrows. a forage-harvester and a rotovator.
